minesweeperpackage

Class MineSweeperGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • minesweeperpackage.MineSweeperGame

  • public class MineSweeperGame
extends java.lang.Object
    A class contains all functions of the Mine Sweeper game itself.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kate McGowan, Adam Stewart, Sierra Ellison

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MineSweeperGame()
      Constructor that creates the board/game and sets it to easy by default.
